title: Add new circular HND badge logo asset and use it for header + favicon

requirements.text: Add new generated logo image assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` that match the provided design: modern circular badge for brand text “HND” with a red outer circular border, white inner background, a friendly minimal cartoon chef (smiling) holding a pizza tray, wearing a chef hat and scarf; the “HND” text must be bold, modern, rounded, and use red and green; the asset must be clean, minimal, professional, high-resolution, vector-style, transparent background, with no watermark, blur, or extra text.

quotes:
Create a modern circular badge logo for a WEBSITE brand named "HND".
This logo must be designed for a WEBSITE HEADER and FAVICON use.
Use a red outer circular border and white inner background.
In the center, add a friendly cartoon chef character holding a pizza tray, wearing a chef hat and scarf, smiling.
Below the chef, write the brand name "HND" in bold modern rounded typography using red and green colors.
The logo should be clean, minimal, professional, and suitable for website branding.
Output must be high resolution, vector style, transparent background, no watermark, no blur, no extra text, scalable for web use.

acceptanceCriteria: The following files exist in `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with transparent backgrounds and crisp edges at 1:1 zoom: `hnd-logo-badge-chef.dim_512x512.png` and `hnd-favicon-badge-chef.dim_64x64.png`.

The logo visually matches the specified layout: red circular border + white inner circle, chef character holding a pizza tray with chef hat + scarf, smiling, and “HND” text beneath in bold rounded styling using red + green.
No watermarking, no additional text besides “HND”, and no visible blur/pixelation artifacts.

requirements.text: Update the site UI to use the new HND badge logo asset for all current logo placements (header logo and hero logo), replacing the existing `/assets/generated/hnd-logo-restaurant-transparent.dim_512x512.png` references.

quotes: This logo must be designed for a WEBSITE HEADER and FAVICON use.

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/App.tsx` hero logo uses `/assets/generated/hnd-logo-badge-chef.dim_512x512.png` as the logo `src`.
Logo images still render via the existing `SafeImage` component and retain appropriate `alt` text in English.

requirements.text: Add favicon configuration in `frontend/index.html` to use the new favicon asset so browsers display the HND badge in the tab icon.

quotes: This logo must be designed for a WEBSITE HEADER and FAVICON use.

acceptanceCriteria: When running the app in a browser, the tab favicon displays the new HND badge logo.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only UI components).
Keep changes limited to logo assets and logo references; do not change existing site sections or unrelated content.
All new image assets must be added as static files under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (do not serve images from the backend).
nonGoals: Redesigning the menu UI or changing menu data.
Changing business name/tagline/SEO text beyond favicon linkage.
Adding new pages or new site sections.

required: Circular badge logo with red outer ring and white inner circle; centered friendly minimal cartoon chef holding a pizza tray, wearing chef hat and scarf, smiling; “HND” in bold rounded modern type below the chef using red and green; transparent background (hnd-logo-badge-chef.dim_512x512.png)
Simplified circular badge favicon matching the same chef + “HND” mark; readable at small size; transparent background (hnd-favicon-badge-chef.dim_64x64.png)
